title: 5Ksana_HandMade
author: 5Ksana_HandMade
content: The artwork- embroidery “Eyes of Bitcoin  is done!All that's left is to make a wooden frame.If you want to buy my artwork now, please send me a DM.

comments.author: Framelover
comments.body: Quote from: 5Ksana_HandMade on May 06, 2023, 07:26:30 AMThe artwork- embroidery “Eyes of Bitcoin  is done!All that's left is to make a wooden frame.If you want to buy my artwork now, please send me a DM.Congratulations on completing your artwork, "Eyes of Bitcoin", It sounds like a unique, one of a kind and interesting piece.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Just jumping in real quick, colouring of this one is really well done!Do you mind sharing some info on how exactly you created this? If it's with different coloured threads, this must be a ton of work.Also, consider selling it without a frame - will be much easier and cheaper for inernational shipping.

comments.author: 5Ksana_HandMade
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on May 08, 2023, 05:39:28 AMJust jumping in real quick, colouring of this one is really well done!Do you mind sharing some info on how exactly you created this? If it's with different coloured threads, this must be a ton of work.Also, consider selling it without a frame - will be much easier and cheaper for inernational shipping.Thank you for the kind words about my artwork! I'm thrilled that you enjoyed it!350 hours of work!42 thread colors!This week, my artwork will be in a wooden frame.International shipping is free and inexpensive up to $50.https://twitter.com/5Ksana/status/1655155720180883457?s=20https://twitter.com/5Ksana/status/1654070271039373312?s=20https://twitter.com/5Ksana/status/1653756259940663302?s=20https://twitter.com/5Ksana/status/1653315349532508160?s=20https://twitter.com/5Ksana/status/1651910894396268545?s=20

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: That's some impressive effort! The preview of the frame does indeed make it look even better.Good luck with your sale, I hope you will find an offer that's appreciative of all the work you put in there.

comments.author: 5Ksana_HandMade
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on May 08, 2023, 09:43:07 AMThat's some impressive effort! The preview of the frame does indeed make it look even better.Good luck with your sale, I hope you will find an offer that's appreciative of all the work you put in there.Thanks for support!
